Dialogue.Page: TO ALL TRAVELERS: Tektite told me that there's a new, suspiciously ship-shaped dent on that locked Nomai door inside the large geyser mountain.
Whoever made that dent with their ship, I'll find out next time you bring your ship back for maintenance and repairs. And I'll probably wring your neck.

Mayor Rutile's already decided we shouldn't be poking our four eyes there, anywho. Whatever's in there, the Nomai probably wanted it locked up behind a <color=orange>big, impenetrable door</color> for good reason.
I don't personally care about evil spirits, or curses, or whatever story spreads around the campfire about why it's locked up - but stop hurting my ships trying to break down this door!
Figure out some other way inside, for crying out loud. Aren't you travellers supposed to be the curious, intelligent sort? --Slate
